charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) POSSESSION OF CRACK COCAINE WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Impr 117 Mos consisting of 57 mos impr on Cts 1 &; 2; 57 mos impr on Ct 3; sent served conc w/one another; 60 months on Ct 4 served consec w/Cts 1-3; SA $200.00 (Cts 1-4); Super Rel 4 Yrs (Cts 1 &; 2); 3 Yrs (Cts 3 &; 4) served conc; Std cond w/spec cond: not possess firearm; access to finl info by Prob Off; refrain frm unlawful use of controlled substance; submit 1 drug test within 15 days of commencement of super rel &; to at least 2 periodic drug tests thereafter as directed by Prob Ofcr; Deft shall not be denied any Federal benefits (1)

Impr 117 Mos consisting of 57 mos impr on Cts 1 &; 2; 57 mos impr on Ct 3; sent served conc w/one another; 60 months on Ct 4 served consec w/Cts 1-3; SA $200.00 (Cts 1-4); Super Rel 4 Yrs (Cts 1 &; 2); 3 Yrs (Cts 3 &; 4) served conc; Std cond w/spec cond: not possess firearm; access to finl info by Prob Off; refrain frm unlawful use of controlled substance; submit 1 drug test within 15 days of commencement of super rel &; to at least 2 periodic drug tests thereafter as directed by Prob Ofcr; Deft shall not be denied any Federal benefits (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) and Section 2 USE OF A FIREARM IN CONNECTION WITH A CRIME OF VIOLENCE OR DRUG TRAFFICKING (4)

charges.charge_disposition: Impr 117 Mos consisting of 57 mos impr on Cts 1 &; 2; 57 mos impr on Ct 3; sent served conc w/one another; 60 months on Ct 4 served consec w/Cts 1-3; SA $200.00 (Cts 1-4); Super Rel 4 Yrs (Cts 1 &; 2); 3 Yrs (Cts 3 &; 4) served conc; Std cond w/spec cond: not possess firearm; access to finl info by Prob Off; refrain frm unlawful use of controlled substance; submit 1 drug test within 15 days of commencement of super rel &; to at least 2 periodic drug tests thereafter as directed by Prob Ofcr; Deft shall not be denied any Federal benefits (4)

37 mos. Ct 3 and 60 mos Ct 4 served consecutively to one another: Supr. Rel 3 yrs; Spec. Assessment $100; std cond; spec cond; not possess firearm; access to financial information; participate in an outpatient program; refrain from use of a controlled substance; dft to receive drug treatment as deemed necessary and be placed in a confinement close to his family; fine waived due to inability to pay; dft not denied any federal benefits. (3)
